data.title: 美股
data.text:
董事会

Peter W. Brown

Peter W. Brown is currently the Chairman at SPAR Group, Inc. He previously worked as a Director at Affinity Insurance Ltd. from 2013 to 2021. He also served as a Director at Business Ideas Provider Group SRL. Additionally, he was a Director at SPAR Brasil Servi os de Merchandising e Tecnologia SA from 2014 to 2016. Mr. Brown holds an MBA from The Isenberg School of Management and an undergraduate degree from the University of Massachusetts Amherst College of Natural Science.

Williams H. Bartels

Williams H. Bartels is the founder of SPAR Group, Inc. which was founded in 1967. He currently holds the position of Director at SPAR Group, Inc. Additionally, Mr. Bartels currently holds the position of Vice Chairman, Secretary, Treasurer & SVP at SPAR Incentives Marketing, Inc. since 1993, Vice Chairman, Secretary, Treasurer & SVP at SPAR, Inc. since 1979, Vice Chairman, Secretary, Treasurer & Senior VP at SPAR Marketing Force, Inc. since 1996, Vice Chairman, Secretary, Treasurer & Senior VP at SPAR since 1994, Vice Chairman, Secretary, Treasurer & Senior VP at SPAR Marketing, Inc. since 1993, and Director at SPAR Management Services, Inc.

旧服务已下线，请迁移至 http://api.fanyi.baidu.com

Peter W. Brown

Peter W. Brown is currently the Chairman at SPAR Group, Inc. He previously worked as a Director at Affinity Insurance Ltd. from 2013 to 2021. He also served as a Director at Business Ideas Provider Group SRL. Additionally, he was a Director at SPAR Brasil Servi os de Merchandising e Tecnologia SA from 2014 to 2016. Mr. Brown holds an MBA from The Isenberg School of Management and an undergraduate degree from the University of Massachusetts Amherst College of Natural Science.

Panagiotis N. Lazaretos

Panagiotis N. Lazaretos is currently the Chief Executive Officer & Director at brooqLy, Inc. He previously worked as an Independent Director at SPAR Group, Inc. from 2019 to 2022, as a Regional Director-Field Marketing Services at Adecco Group NA from 2013 to 2016, and as a Director & Chief International Development Officer at Elvictor Group, Inc. from 2017 to 2020. Lazaretos received an undergraduate degree from State University of New York College at New Paltz in 1997 and an MBA from Pace University.

Michael R. Matacunas

Michael R. Matacunas is currently the President, Chief Executive Officer & Director at SPAR Group, Inc. He is also the Chairman, Secretary & Treasurer at Ad Ventures Advertising, Inc. Previously, he served as the Chief Executive Officer at The Parker Avery Group in 2013. He also held positions as the Chief Administrative Officer at Abbott Laboratories and Family Dollar Stores LLC. From 2013 to 2018, he was the Chief Administrative Officer at Dollar Tree, Inc. Prior to that, he was the Vice President-Strategy & Operations at Manhattan Associates, Inc. in 2006 and the Vice President-Product & Operations at Evant, Inc. from 2003 to 2005. Mr. Matacunas received his undergraduate degree from Boston University and his MBA from The College of William & Mary.

Michael R. Matacunas

Michael R. Matacunas is currently the President, Chief Executive Officer & Director at SPAR Group, Inc. He is also the Chairman, Secretary & Treasurer at Ad Ventures Advertising, Inc. Previously, he served as the Chief Executive Officer at The Parker Avery Group in 2013. He also held positions as the Chief Administrative Officer at Abbott Laboratories and Family Dollar Stores LLC. From 2013 to 2018, he was the Chief Administrative Officer at Dollar Tree, Inc. Prior to that, he was the Vice President-Strategy & Operations at Manhattan Associates, Inc. in 2006 and the Vice President-Product & Operations at Evant, Inc. from 2003 to 2005. Mr. Matacunas received his undergraduate degree from Boston University and his MBA from The College of William & Mary.

James R. Gillis

James R. Gillis is currently the President & Chief Executive Officer at Gillis & Associates. He is also a Director at SPAR Group, Inc., Travelport Worldwide Ltd., Travelport Ltd., and AST Fund Solutions LLC. Previously, he held positions such as COO & CEO-Source Interlink Distribution at Source Interlink Cos., Inc., President & Chief Executive Officer at Posera, Inc., President, Chief Executive Officer & Owner at Brand Manufacturing Corp., Independent Director at ReposiTrak, Inc., Director-Americas Reseller Channel at Dexit, Inc., Director at Armanino Foods of Distinction, Inc., Executive Vice President at Globe Communications Corp., Managing Partner at Burke Gillis Juliano Group LLC, and Managing Partner at Aders, Wilcox & Gillis Group.

James R. Gillis

James R. Gillis is currently the President & Chief Executive Officer at Gillis & Associates. He is also a Director at SPAR Group, Inc., Travelport Worldwide Ltd., Travelport Ltd., and AST Fund Solutions LLC. Previously, he held positions such as COO & CEO-Source Interlink Distribution at Source Interlink Cos., Inc., President & Chief Executive Officer at Posera, Inc., President, Chief Executive Officer & Owner at Brand Manufacturing Corp., Independent Director at ReposiTrak, Inc., Director-Americas Reseller Channel at Dexit, Inc., Director at Armanino Foods of Distinction, Inc., Executive Vice President at Globe Communications Corp., Managing Partner at Burke Gillis Juliano Group LLC, and Managing Partner at Aders, Wilcox & Gillis Group.

John B. Bode

John B. Bode is currently the Chief Executive Officer & Director at FISION Corp., the Chief Executive Officer at Fision Holdings, Inc., an Independent Director at SPAR Group, Inc., an Independent Director at Zevra Therapeutics, Inc., a Director at Postmedia Network, Inc., a Director at McClatchy Co. LLC, and the EVP, Chief Financial & Transformation Officer at Postmedia Network Canada Corp. He is also the Managing Partner at Aerie Investments LLC. In the past, Mr. Bode served as an Independent Director at Proficient Alpha Acquisition Corp., the Chief Financial Officer & Executive Vice President at Source Interlink Cos., Inc., an Accountant at BDO USA PC, the Chief Financial Officer & Executive Vice President at Tribune Publishing Co., and the Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President at ReaderLink Distribution Services LLC. Mr. Bode obtained his undergraduate degree from the University of Notre Dame in 1996.
